attributes.action: investigate collusion between the security forces of the Irish Republic and the IRA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given he controversy between alleged collusion between Loyalist terrorists and members of the British security forces, will the Prime Minster turn his attention to the alleged collusion between the security services of the Republic of Ireland and the IRA.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
